name: bitsf1o

comment: The ` bits ` function restricted to nonnegative integers is a bijection from the integers to the finite sets of integers. It is in fact the inverse of the Ackermann bijection ~ ackbijnn . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2016.)
